homePage.homePageDescription: Thank you for being here! I'm excited to show you what I've built and how I've used exciting technologies in this project. I look forward to a productive and enjoyable meeting. üòä

measurementDataCharts.deviceDataOverviewDescription: Explore detailed metrics and visualisation and compare them to all other devices to identify potential anomalies or faulty devices.
measurementDataCharts.selectDeviceDescription: Select a device to view its data.
measurementDataCharts.sensorMetricsComparisonDescription: The bars are colored based on their comparison to the global average.

barchart.slightDeviation: Slight difference from global average (Possible issues)
barchart.anomalyDetected: Large difference from global average (Possible anomaly)

measurementViewPage.headingDescription: Manage your measurements for your devices.
